title: Xavier
description: Author Note: I'm reworking my release schedule and XAVIER is currently on hold. Please subscribe to my newsletter for timing updates and other good stuff!https://confirmsubscription.com/h/d/7...I am the archangel Xavier,General of the Angelic Army.My life began at the dawn of time,And in all the long eons since I have only known war, never love.Until HER.Enter the Angelbound Worlds, a new series of novellas that take place within different areas and eras of the after-realms (Heaven, Hell, Purgatory, the Dark Lands, and Antrum). Donâ€™t miss Book 1 in the Angelbound Worlds series, in which the archangel Xavier shares how he finally fell in love.Suggested to read after Angelbound Origins Book 1.
author: Christina Bauer
